attributes.additional_details: The American bully (micro, pocket, classic.standard and xl) a beautiful natured dog, amazing around all other animals and all aged people! There are thousands of people with this breed as loving family pets and so many people will be devastated for them to be labelled a bad dog on the banned breed list!
attributes.background: Don’t add the American bully to the official uk banned breed dog list!

rejection.details: There are no current plans to ban "Xl bullies" in the UK. We're therefore not sure what action you'd like to see.
